Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN

if :query.proc_begin_date is not null and :query.proc_end_date is not null then
 
 if :query.proc_begin_date > :query.proc_end_date and error_code = 0 then
 
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',1064,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
 :query.proc_end_date := null;
 
 :system.message_level:=10;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 :system.message_level:=0;
 
 end if;
 
end if; 
 
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare

 v_alert number;
begin
if :query.proc_begin_date is not null and :query.proc_end_date is not null then
 
 if :query.proc_begin_date > :query.proc_end_date and error_code = 0 then
 
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',1064,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
 :query.proc_end_date := null;
 -- go_item('CONTROL_BLK.EXECUTE_DATE_TO'); 
 
 
 :system.message_level:=10;
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 :system.message_level:=0;
 end if;
 
end if; 
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF :query.process_seq IS NOT NULL 
 AND :query.process_user IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',360,NULL,'מספר עיבוד','שם משתמש',NULL);
 :query.process_seq := NULL;
 END IF; 
 
 if :QUERY.PROCESS_USER is not null then
 begin
 select t.first_name||' '||t.family_name family_name 
 into :QUERY.PROCESS_USER_DISP
 from rm_users t
 where user_name=:QUERY.PROCESS_USER;
 exception when others then
 v_alert:=display_comment('APP',444,null,'לא קיים משתמש בשם זה',null,null);
 :QUERY.PROCESS_USER_DISP:=null;
 end;
 end if;

 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_lov BOOLEAN;
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 v_lov := SHOW_LOV('PROCESS_USER_LOV');
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF (:query.process_user IS NOT NULL 
 OR :query.proc_begin_date IS NOT NULL) 
 AND :query.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',360,NULL,'מספר עיבוד','תאריך ושם משתמש',NULL);
 :query.process_user := NULL;
 :query.proc_begin_date := NULL;
 :query.proc_end_date := NULL;
 :query.job_status := NULL;
 :query.TEMPLATE_SEQ := NULL;
 :query.TASK_CODE := NULL;
 END IF; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 IF :system.cursor_item = 'QUERY.PROC_BEGIN_DATE' THEN
 GO_ITEM(:system.cursor_item);
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK');
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('QUERY.PROC_BEGIN_DATE');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK');
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 IF :system.cursor_item = 'QUERY.PROC_END_DATE' THEN
 GO_ITEM(:system.cursor_item);
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK');
 ELSE
 GO_ITEM('QUERY.PROC_END_DATE');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER('WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK');
 END IF;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 v_alert number;
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 if :query.process_seq is not null and (
 :query.process_user IS NOT NULL
 OR :query.proc_begin_date IS NOT NULL
 OR :query.proc_end_date IS NOT NULL 
 OR :query.job_status IS NOT NULL
 OR :query.TEMPLATE_SEQ IS NOT NULL
 OR :query.TASK_CODE IS NOT NULL ) then
 
 :query.process_user := NULL;
 :query.proc_begin_date := NULL;
 :query.proc_end_date := NULL;
 :query.job_status := NULL;
 :query.TEMPLATE_SEQ := NULL;
 :query.TASK_CODE := NULL;
 end if;
 
 GO_BLOCK('sr_jobs_view');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NULL THEN
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',50128,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL); --142
 GO_BLOCK('QUERY');
 END IF;
 END IF;
 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.current_block <> 'QUERY' then
 go_block('QUERY');
 end if;
 clear_block(no_validate);
 :global.calling_form := null;
 go_item('QUERY.PROC_BEGIN_DATE');

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN
 IF :query.job_status IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT value_name 
 INTO :query.job_status_desc
 FROM rm_decode_values 
 WHERE decode_code = 100
 AND value_code = :query.job_status;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',155,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL);
 :query.job_status := NULL;
 :query.job_status_desc := NULL;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END;
 ELSE
 :query.job_status_desc := NULL;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 one_second NUMBER := 1000;
 timer_id TIMER;
BEGIN
 IF NOT ID_NULL(FIND_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER')) THEN
 DELETE_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER');
 END IF; 
 if :QUERY.REFRESH_TIME is not null then 
 timer_id := CREATE_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER',(one_second*:QUERY.REFRESH_TIME),NO_REPEAT);
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_lov BOOLEAN;
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 if :QUERY.TASK_CODE is null then 
 v_lov := SHOW_LOV('ALL_STEP_NUM');
 END IF;
 if :QUERY.TASK_CODE is not null then 
 v_lov := SHOW_LOV('LOV_STEP_NUM');
 END IF;
 end if;
END;

Block.Name: SR_JOBS_VIEW
Block.QueryDataSourceName:
SELECT 
 PROCESS_SEQ,
 PROCESS_NAME,
 STEP_NUM,
 process_user STAMP_USER,
 process_stamp_action stamp_action,
 JOB_NUM,
 JOB_STATUS,
 proc_begin_date PROCESS_START,
 proc_end_date PROCESS_END,
 TASK_SEQ,
 TEMPLATE_NUM,
 process_cdate STAMP_CDATE,
 jv.job_queue,
 jv.job_run,
 jv.sid,
 jv.broken,
 DECODE(jv.failures, 0, null, failures) failures, 
 jv.next_date,
 jv.this_date,
 jv.last_date
 FROM sr_jobs_view jv
Block.DMLDataName:
SELECT 
 PROCESS_SEQ,
 PROCESS_NAME,
 STEP_NUM,
 process_user STAMP_USER,
 process_stamp_action stamp_action,
 JOB_NUM,
 JOB_STATUS,
 proc_begin_date PROCESS_START,
 proc_end_date PROCESS_END,
 TASK_SEQ,
 TEMPLATE_NUM,
 process_cdate STAMP_CDATE,
 jv.job_queue,
 jv.job_run,
 jv.sid,
 jv.broken,
 DECODE(jv.failures, 0, null, failures) failures, 
 jv.next_date,
 jv.this_date,
 jv.last_date
 FROM sr_jobs_view jv

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Send To A Proc. That Release The Job */
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN
 if :sr_jobs_view.PROCESS_SEQ is not null then 
 begin 
 sr_jobs_pkg.broken_job(:sr_jobs_view.job_queue,FALSE);
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',359,NULL,'שוחרר',NULL,NULL);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_RECORD(:parameter.current_rec);
 :parameter.current_rec := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',CURRENT_RECORD); 
EXCEPTION

 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',444,NULL,SQLERRM ||chr(10) || ' שחרור הקפאה נכשל, יש לפנות לתמיכה ',NULL,NULL);
END; 
 end if; 
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Send To A Proc. That Broke The Job */
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
BEGIN
 :parameter.current_rec := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',CURRENT_RECORD);
 sr_jobs_pkg.broken_job(:sr_jobs_view.job_queue,TRUE);
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',359,NULL,'הוקפא',NULL,NULL);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_RECORD(:parameter.current_rec);
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',444,NULL,SQLERRM ||chr(10) || ' הקפאת עיבוד נכשלה, יש לפנות לתמיכה ',NULL,NULL);
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Get Job Num And Remove From Queue */
/* Update Job Status In "rm_processes" */
DECLARE
 v_alert NUMBER;
 l_dummy varchar2(2000);
BEGIN
 :parameter.current_rec := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',CURRENT_RECORD);

 sr_jobs_pkg.remove_job(:sr_jobs_view.job_queue);
 l_dummy := DBA_PKG.KILL_RUNNING_JOB(:sr_jobs_view.job_queue,:SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ);
 
 UPDATE rm_processes
 SET job_status = 7,PROCESS_END=sysdate
 WHERE process_seq = :sr_jobs_view.process_seq;
 COMMIT;
 
 SET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(CURSOR_STYLE,'DEFAULT');
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',359,NULL,'הוסר',NULL,NULL);
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_RECORD(:parameter.current_rec);
EXCEPTION
 WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN
 NULL;
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 v_alert := DISPLAY_COMMENT('APP',444,NULL,SQLERRM ||chr(10) || ' הסרת עיבוד נכשלה, יש לפנות לתמיכה ',NULL,NULL);
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 :global.process_seq := :sr_jobs_view.process_seq;
 ELSE
 :global.process_seq := NULL;
 END IF;
 CALL_FORM('sr_batch_log');
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 :parameter.current_rec := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',CURRENT_RECORD); 
 GO_Block('RM_PROCESS_PARAM');
 Execute_Query;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 :parameter.current_rec := GET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',CURRENT_RECORD); 
 GO_Block('RM_PROCESS_PARAM');
 Execute_Query;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
:global.process_seq := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.process_seq;
if :SR_JOBS_VIEW.TASK_SEQ in (340,341) then
 CALL_FORM('fr_check_potential');
else
 CALL_FORM('RM_POTENTIAL_DEFINITION');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
BEGIN
 IF global.help_pressed != 'Y' THEN
 :global.process_seq := null;
 EXIT_FORM;
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_activity_code sr_log_actions.activity_code%TYPE;
 v_file_name RM_ACTIVITY_VERSIONS.file_name%TYPE;
BEGIN
 IF NVL(:sr_jobs_view.process_seq,0) <> 0 THEN
 :GLOBAL.PROCESS_SEQ := :sr_jobs_view.process_seq;
 SELECT activity_code 
 INTO v_activity_code
 FROM sr_log_actions a, sr_log_message_actions b
 WHERE b.message_num = 1
 AND b.message_type = 6
 AND a. action_num = b.action_num
 AND b.main_yn = 'Y'
 AND b.stamp_action != 'D'
 AND b.task_seq = NVL(:sr_jobs_view.task_seq,-1);
 
 SELECT file_name
 INTO v_file_name
 FROM RM_ACTIVITY_VERSIONS
 WHERE activity_code=v_activity_code
 AND activity_type=21
 AND default_yn='Y';
 CALL_FORM(v_file_name);
 END IF;
EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN NULL; 
END;

Trigger.Name: POST-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 e_get_status EXCEPTION;
 
 procedure set_color(pi_va varchar2) is
 begin
 set_item_instance_property('SR_JOBS_VIEW.INDICATOR', CURRENT_RECORD, VISUAL_ATTRIBUTE,pi_va); 
 end;
 
BEGIN
 /*
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 BEGIN
 SELECT j.job job_queue,
 j.broken,
 j.failures,
 j.next_date,
 j.this_date,
 j.last_date
 INTO :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_QUEUE,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.BROKEN,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.FAILURES,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.NEXT_DATE,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.THIS_DATE,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.LAST_DATE
 FROM sys.dba_jobs j
 WHERE j.job = :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_NUM;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT jr.JOB,
 jr.SID
 INTO :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_RUNNING_NOW,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.SID
 FROM sys.dba_jobs_running jr
 WHERE jr.job = :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_NUM;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;
 END IF;
 
 */
 
 BEGIN
 SR_JOBS_PKG.get_details
 (p_job => :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_QUEUE,
 p_type => :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_TYPE,
 p_interval => :SR_JOBS_VIEW.interval_time 
 );
 --:sr_jobs_view.MAP_STATUS:=SR_JOBS_PKG.GET_MAP_STATUS( :SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ); 
 EXCEPTION
 when OTHERS then
 null;
 END;
 
 
 
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.START_DATE := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_START;
 --עיבוד הוסר(sr_jobs_pkg.remove_job but not kill session job_status = 7 )
 -- BEGIN
 /*
 0 נשלח להרצה
 1 ממתין לריצה
 2 סיים ונכשל
 3 סיים בהצלחה
 4 לא נשלח
 5 בריצה
 6 נכשל (לא סיים)
 7 עיבוד הוסר
 8 סיים עם שגיאות
 9 מתוזמן
 */
 /* IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS IN (2, 3) THEN
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_num IS NOT NULL and :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS NOT IN (0,7,8) THEN
 -- בריצה
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 5;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_QUEUE IS NOT NULL AND
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS = 0 AND
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.NEXT_DATE > SYSDATE THEN
 -- מתוזמן
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.START_DATE := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.NEXT_DATE;
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 9;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_QUEUE IS NOT NULL and :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS NOT IN (7, 8) THEN
 -- מחכה לתורו לרוץ 
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 1;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS IS NULL THEN
 -- לא נשלח
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 4;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS IN (0, 7, 8) THEN
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_STATUS = 1 THEN
 -- נכשל ולא סיים
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 6;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF;
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS := 6;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN e_get_status THEN
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC := Get_Desc_Query_Pkg.get_code_desc_query(100,
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS);
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END;*/
 --:SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC_NEW:=:SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC;
 --:SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS_NEW:=:SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS; 
 
 --:SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC:=sr_jobs_pkg.get_job_status_desc(:SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ, :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS);
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC:=sr_jobs_pkg.get_map_status(:SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ, :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS);
 --:SR_JOBS_VIEW.JOB_DESC:=RM_GENERAL.get_job_status_desc(:SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ);
 
 if :QUERY.JOB_STATUS = 9 and nvl(:SR_JOBS_VIEW.NEXT_DATE,sysdate-1) <= sysdate then
 raise form_trigger_failure;
 end if;
 
 /* במידה והעיבוד מוקפא */
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.BROKEN IS NOT NULL AND :SR_JOBS_VIEW.BROKEN <> 'N' THEN
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.SHOW_BROKEN := CHR(51);
 ELSE
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.SHOW_BROKEN := NULL;
 END IF;
 
 BEGIN
 SELECT t.first_name || ' ' || t.family_name family_name
 INTO :SR_JOBS_VIEW.STAMP_USER_DISP
 FROM rm_users t
 WHERE t.user_name = :SR_JOBS_VIEW.STAMP_USER;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 :SR_JOBS_VIEW.STAMP_USER_DISP := :SR_JOBS_VIEW.STAMP_USER;
 END;
 
 IF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (9) then
 set_color('VA_SCHEDULE');
 ELSIF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (5) then
 set_color('VA_RUN'); 
 ELSIF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (2,8) then
 set_color('VA_FAILURE'); 
 ELSIF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (6) then
 set_color('VA_FAILURE_NOT_FINISHED'); 
 ELSIF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (7) then
 set_color('VA_CANCELED'); 
 ELSIF :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS in (1,4) then
 set_color('VA_WAIT');
 ELSE 
 set_color('VA_FINISHED');
 END IF;
exception
 when form_trigger_failure then
 raise form_trigger_failure; 
END;

Trigger.Name: PRE-QUERY
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_where VARCHAR2(800) := 'stamp_action<>''D''';
 l_dummy varchar2(200);
 v_Desc VARCHAR2(100);
BEGIN

 IF NOT ID_NULL(FIND_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER')) THEN
 DELETE_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER');
 END IF; 

 if :global.calling_form IN(862,1003) THEN -- yuri 28/10/14
 IF :global.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 begin 
 select template_num,stamp_user
 into l_dummy,:query.process_user
 from rm_processes t
 where t.process_seq = :global.process_seq ;
 if l_dummy is not null then
 v_where := v_where ||' AND template_num = '||l_dummy;
 end if;
 :query.process_seq := null;
 exception
 when others then
 null;
 end;
 end if; 
 end if;
 --
 
 IF :query.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND process_seq = :query.process_seq';
 END IF;
 IF :query.process_user IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND stamp_user = :query.process_user';
 END IF;
 
 IF :query.proc_begin_date IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND TRUNC(process_start) >= :query.proc_begin_date';
 END IF;
 
 IF :query.proc_end_date IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND trunc(process_end) <= :query.proc_end_date';
 END IF;
 IF :query.process_name IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND UPPER(process_name) LIKE UPPER('||''''||'%'||:query.process_name||'%'||''''||')'||''; 
 END IF;
 
 IF :query.job_status IS NOT NULL THEN
 IF :query.job_status IN (2,3) THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND job_status = '||:query.job_status;
 ELSIF :query.job_status = 5 THEN-- בריצה
 v_where :=v_where ||' and job_run is not null';
 --v_where :=v_where ||' AND exists(SELECT /*+ FIRST_ROWS(40) */ 1 from SR_JOBS_VIEW v where rm_processes.process_seq = v.process_seq and job_run is not null)'||
 -- ' AND job_status not in (0,7,8)'||
 -- ' AND process_start >= (SYSDATE-7)';
 ELSIF :query.job_status = 9 THEN-- מתוזמן
 v_where := v_where || ' AND job_status = 0 and job_num is not null and NEXT_DATE > SYSDATE '; 
 ELSIF :query.job_status = 1 THEN --ממתין לריצה
 v_where := v_where ||' AND job_queue IS NOT NULL
 and JOB_RUN is null
 AND job_status NOT In(2,3,7, 8) ';
 ELSIF :query.job_status = 4 THEN--לא נשלח
 v_where := v_where || ' AND job_status IS NULL';
 ELSIF :query.job_status in (0, 7, 8) THEN--נשלח להרצה
 v_where := v_where || ' AND job_status = '||:query.job_status;
 ELSIF :query.job_status = 6 THEN --נכשל ולא סיים
 v_where := v_where || ' AND job_status = 1';
 END IF;
 END IF;

 IF :query.process_seq IS NULL
 AND :query.process_user IS NULL
 AND :query.proc_begin_date IS NULL
 AND :query.proc_end_date IS NULL 
 AND :query.job_status IS NULL
 AND :query.TEMPLATE_SEQ IS NULL
 AND :query.TASK_CODE IS NULL
 AND :query.STEP_NUM IS NULL
 AND :query.process_name IS NULL THEN -- ברירת מחדל
 v_where := v_where ||' AND trunc(process_start) >= trunc(sysdate)';
 :query.proc_begin_date := trunc(sysdate);
 END IF;
 if :QUERY.TASK_CODE is not null then
 v_where := v_where || ' AND TASK_SEQ = '||:QUERY.TASK_CODE;
 end if;
 INSERT_DEBUG('MY_CHECK1' || :QUERY.TASK_CODE);
 IF :QUERY.STEP_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN
 v_where := v_where ||' AND STEP_NUM = '||:QUERY.STEP_NUM;
 END IF;
 INSERT_DEBUG('MY_CHECK2' || :QUERY.STEP_NUM );
 if :QUERY.TEMPLATE_SEQ is not null then
 if :QUERY.TEMPLATE_TYPE = 'יתרות' then 
 v_where := v_where || ' AND TEMPLATE_NUM = '||:QUERY.TEMPLATE_SEQ||
 ' and TASK_SEQ in (342,343)' ;
 else
 v_where := v_where || ' AND TEMPLATE_NUM = '||:QUERY.TEMPLATE_SEQ||
 ' and TASK_SEQ in (340,341)' ;
 end if; 
 end if;
 
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view',DEFAULT_WHERE,v_where);
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_profile NUMBER;
 v_release NUMBER := 0; /*שחרור */
 v_broken NUMBER := 0; /* הקפאה */
 v_remove NUMBER :=0; /* הסרה */
BEGIN

 
 
 SR_JOBS_PKG.SET_BUTTONS_STATUS (P_PROCESS_SEQ => :sr_jobs_view.PROCESS_SEQ, 
 P_USER_NAME => :GLOBAL.USER_NAME,
 P_SHOW_BROKEN => :sr_jobs_view.SHOW_BROKEN ,
 P_INTERVAL_TIME => :sr_jobs_view.INTERVAL_TIME,
 P_JOB_RUNNING_NOW => :sr_jobs_view.JOB_RUNNING_NOW, 
 P_MAP_STATUS => :SR_JOBS_VIEW.MAP_STATUS,
 P_REMOVE_BUT => v_remove,
 P_RELEASE_BUT => v_release,
 P_BROKEN_BUT => v_broken
 );
 
 sr_jobs_view_pkg.enable_button (v_remove,v_broken,v_release);
 sr_jobs_view_pkg.enable_button_param(:sr_jobs_view.process_name);
 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_BLOCK('RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_BLOCK('sr_jobs_view');
 END IF;
END;

Trigger.Name: ON-POPULATE-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 recstat VARCHAR2(20) := :System.record_status; 
 startitm VARCHAR2(61) := :System.cursor_item; 
 rel_id Relation;
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 IF ( recstat = 'NEW' or recstat = 'INSERT' ) THEN 
 RETURN;
 END IF;
 --
 -- Begin RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail program section
 --
 IF ( (:SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ is not null) ) THEN 
 rel_id := Find_Relation('SR_JOBS_VIEW.SR_JOBS_VIEW_RM_PROCESS_PAR'); 
 Query_Master_Details(rel_id, 'RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM'); 
 END IF;
 --
 -- End RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail program section
 --

 IF ( :System.cursor_item <> startitm ) THEN 
 Go_Item(startitm); 
 Check_Package_Failure; 
 END IF;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

Trigger.Name: ON-CHECK-DELETE-MASTER
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation declare section
--
DECLARE
 Dummy_Define CHAR(1);
 --
 -- Begin RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail declare section
 --
 CURSOR RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur IS 
 SELECT 1 FROM rm_process_param r 
 WHERE r.PROCESS_SEQ = :SR_JOBS_VIEW.PROCESS_SEQ;
 --
 -- End RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail declare section
 --
--
-- End default relation declare section
--
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 --
 -- Begin RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail program section
 --
 OPEN RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur; 
 FETCH RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur INTO Dummy_Define; 
 IF ( RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur%found ) THEN 
 Message('Cannot delete master record when matching detail records exist.'); 
 CLOSE RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur; 
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure; 
 END IF;
 CLOSE RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM_cur;
 --
 -- End RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM detail program section
 --
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--

ProgramUnit.Name: SR_JOBS_VIEW_PKG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE sr_jobs_view_pkg IS
 --
 PROCEDURE enable_button(v_remove IN NUMBER,
 v_broken IN NUMBER,
 v_release IN NUMBER);
 --
 PROCEDURE enable_button_param(process_name in varchar2);
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: SR_JOBS_VIEW_PKG
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PACKAGE BODY sr_jobs_view_pkg IS
/* ===================================================================
 Date : 08/11/1999
 Programmer : inbar abend
 Name : get_job_status_desc
 Description : The Procedure Will Get Job Status Desc Due To Job
 Status Code
 Parameters : None
=======================================================================*/
FUNCTION get_job_status_desc
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 v_desc varchar2(100);
 v_status pls_integer;
 e_get_status exception;
BEGIN 
 --עיבוד הוסר(sr_jobs_pkg.remove_job but not kill session job_status = 7 )
BEGIN 
 /*
 0 נשלח להרצה
 1 ממתין לריצה
 2 סיים ונכשל
 3 סיים בהצלחה
 4 לא נשלח
 5 בריצה
 6 נכשל (לא סיים)
 7 עיבוד הוסר
 8 סיים עם שגיאות
 9 מתוזמן
 */
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status IN (2,3) THEN
 v_status := :sr_jobs_view.job_status;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_num IS NOT NULL and :sr_jobs_view.job_status not in (7,8) THEN -- בריצה
 v_status := 5;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_queue IS NOT NULL and :sr_jobs_view.job_status <> 8 THEN -- מחכה לתורו לרוץ 
 v_status := 1;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status IS NULL THEN -- לא נשלח
 v_status := 4;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status = 0 THEN -- נשלח להרצה
 v_status := 0;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF ; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status = 1 THEN -- נכשל ולא סיים
 v_status := 6;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status = 7 THEN --עיבוד הוסר
 v_status := 7;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 
 IF :sr_jobs_view.job_status = 8 THEN --עיבוד סיים עם שגיאות
 v_status := 8;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 END IF; 
 v_status := 6;
 RAISE e_get_status;
 EXCEPTION
 WHEN e_get_status THEN
 v_desc := Get_Desc_Query_Pkg.get_code_desc_query(100, v_status);
 WHEN OTHERS THEN
 NULL;
 END; 
 RETURN(v_desc);
END;
/* ===============================================================================
 Date : 09/11/1999
 Programmer : inbar abend
 Name : enable_button 
 Description : The procedure Will change buttons from enable to disable when moving
 from one row to another.
 Parameters : Name Order Type DataType Description
 ----------- ----- ---- -------- -----------
 v_insert 1 IN NUMBER 
 v_update 2 IN NUMBER
 v_exit 3 IN NUMBER
=================================================================================*/
PROCEDURE enable_button (v_remove IN NUMBER,
 v_broken IN NUMBER,
 v_release IN NUMBER) IS
BEGIN
 
 IF v_remove = 1 THEN
 
 
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.remove',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.remove',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 END IF;

 IF v_broken = 1 THEN
 
 null;
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.broken_button',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.broken_button',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 END IF;

 IF v_release = 1 THEN
 

 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.release',ENABLED,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 ELSE
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.release',ENABLED,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 
 END IF;
 
END;
---------------------------------------------------------------------
--tzvia 10/07/2014
---------------------------------------------------------------------
 PROCEDURE enable_button_param(process_name in varchar2)
 is
 begin
 if :SR_JOBS_VIEW.TEMPLATE_NUM is not null then
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.PARAM_ENFORCMENT',visible,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.PARAM_ENFORCMENT',enabled,PROPERTY_TRUE);
 else
 SET_ITEM_PROPERTY('sr_jobs_view.PARAM_ENFORCMENT',visible,PROPERTY_FALSE);
 end if;
 end;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: FORM_FIRST_TIME
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE form_first_time IS
v_where varchar2(300) := '1=1 ';
l_dummy number;
BEGIN
 t.progStart('form_first_time');
 :TITLE.ENTERANCE_MODE := ' ';
 DEFAULT_VALUE(NULL,'GLOBAL.PROCESS_SEQ');
 sr_jobs_view_pkg.enable_button (0,0,0);
 sr_jobs_view_pkg.enable_button_param(:sr_jobs_view.process_name);
 IF :global.calling_form IN(924) THEN
 :query.process_seq := :global.process_seq;
 v_where:=v_where||'and process_seq= '||:global.process_seq;
 SET_BLOCK_PROPERTY('RM_PROCESS_PARAM', DEFAULT_WHERE, v_where);
 :parameter.current_rec:=1;
 GO_BLOCK('RM_PROCESS_PARAM');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 else
 GO_ITEM('QUERY.PROC_BEGIN_DATE');
 IF :global.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 :query.process_seq := :global.process_seq;
 GO_BLOCK('sr_jobs_view');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 IF :sr_jobs_view.process_seq IS NOT NULL THEN
 GO_BLOCK('RM_PROCESS_PARAM_SUM');
 EXECUTE_QUERY;
 GO_BLOCK('sr_jobs_view');
 END IF;
 END IF;
 end if;

 :query.proc_begin_date := trunc(sysdate);

 t.progEnd('form_first_time');
 END;

ProgramUnit.Name: TIMER_EXPIRATION
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE TIMER_EXPIRATION IS
 timer_id TIMER;
 last_record_n number;
 current_record_n number;
 one_second NUMBER := 1000;
BEGIN
 if GET_APPLICATION_PROPERTY(TIMER_NAME) = 'REFRESH_TIMER' then
-- t.progStart('TIMER_EXPIRATION');
-- d.p('timer '||:QUERY.REFRESH_TIME);
 GO_BLOCK('sr_jobs_view');
 last_record_n := get_block_property(:system.current_block,TOP_RECORD) + 
 get_block_property(:system.current_block,RECORDS_DISPLAYED) - 1;
 current_record_n := name_in('SYSTEM.CURSOR_RECORD');
 execute_query;
 go_record(last_record_n); -- Restore display (multi-record blocks)
 go_record(current_record_n); -- Restore cursor

 if :QUERY.REFRESH_TIME is not null then 
 timer_id := CREATE_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER',(one_second*:QUERY.REFRESH_TIME),NO_REPEAT);
 end if;
-- t.progEnd('TIMER_EXPIRATION');
 end if;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: CHECK_PACKAGE_FAILURE
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
Procedure Check_Package_Failure IS
BEGIN
 IF NOT ( Form_Success ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: QUERY_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Query_Master_Details(rel_id Relation,detail VARCHAR2) IS
 oldmsg VARCHAR2(2); -- Old Message Level Setting
 reldef VARCHAR2(5); -- Relation Deferred Setting
BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Variable(s)
 --
 reldef := Get_Relation_Property(rel_id, DEFERRED_COORDINATION);
 oldmsg := :System.Message_Level;
 --
 -- If NOT Deferred, Goto detail and execute the query.
 --
 IF reldef = 'FALSE' THEN
 Go_Block(detail);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 :System.Message_Level := '10';
 Execute_Query;
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Relation is deferred, mark the detail block as un-coordinated
 --
 Set_Block_Property(detail, COORDINATION_STATUS, NON_COORDINATED);
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 :System.Message_Level := oldmsg;
 RAISE;
END Query_Master_Details;

ProgramUnit.Name: CLEAR_ALL_MASTER_DETAILS
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE Clear_All_Master_Details IS
 mastblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Initial Master Block Causing Coord
 coordop VARCHAR2(30); -- Operation Causing the Coord
 trigblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Cur Block On-Clear-Details Fires On
 startitm VARCHAR2(61); -- Item in which cursor started
 frmstat VARCHAR2(15); -- Form Status
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 curdtl VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Detail Block

 FUNCTION First_Changed_Block_Below(Master VARCHAR2)
 RETURN VARCHAR2 IS
 curblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Block
 currel VARCHAR2(30); -- Current Relation
 retblk VARCHAR2(30); -- Return Block
 BEGIN
 --
 -- Initialize Local Vars
 --
 curblk := Master;
 currel := Get_Block_Property(curblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 --
 -- While there exists another relation for this block
 --
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 --
 -- Get the name of the detail block
 --
 curblk := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 --
 -- If this block has changes, return its name
 --
 IF ( Get_Block_Property(curblk, STATUS) = 'CHANGED' ) THEN
 RETURN curblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- No changes, recursively look for changed blocks below
 --
 retblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(curblk);
 --
 -- If some block below is changed, return its name
 --
 IF retblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 RETURN retblk;
 ELSE
 --
 -- Consider the next relation
 --
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- No changed blocks were found
 --
 RETURN NULL;
 END First_Changed_Block_Below;

BEGIN
 --
 -- Init Local Vars
 --
 mastblk := :System.Master_Block;
 coordop := :System.Coordination_Operation;
 trigblk := :System.Trigger_Block;
 startitm := :System.Cursor_Item;
 frmstat := :System.Form_Status;

 --
 -- If the coordination operation is anything but CLEAR_RECORD or
 -- SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS, then continue checking.
 --
 IF coordop NOT IN ('CLEAR_RECORD', 'SYNCHRONIZE_BLOCKS') THEN
 --
 -- If we're processing the driving master block...
 --
 IF mastblk = trigblk THEN
 --
 -- If something in the form is changed, find the
 -- first changed block below the master
 --
 IF frmstat = 'CHANGED' THEN
 curblk := First_Changed_Block_Below(mastblk);
 --
 -- If we find a changed block below, go there
 -- and Ask to commit the changes.
 --
 IF curblk IS NOT NULL THEN
 Go_Block(curblk);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(ASK_COMMIT);
 --
 -- If user cancels commit dialog, raise error
 --
 IF NOT ( :System.Form_Status = 'QUERY'
 OR :System.Block_Status = 'NEW' ) THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 END IF;

 --
 -- Clear all the detail blocks for this master without
 -- any further asking to commit.
 --
 currel := Get_Block_Property(trigblk, FIRST_MASTER_RELATION);
 WHILE currel IS NOT NULL LOOP
 curdtl := Get_Relation_Property(currel, DETAIL_NAME);
 IF Get_Block_Property(curdtl, STATUS) <> 'NEW' THEN
 Go_Block(curdtl);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 Clear_Block(NO_VALIDATE);
 IF :System.Block_Status <> 'NEW' THEN
 RAISE Form_Trigger_Failure;
 END IF;
 END IF;
 currel := Get_Relation_Property(currel, NEXT_MASTER_RELATION);
 END LOOP;

 --
 -- Put cursor back where it started
 --
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 Check_Package_Failure;
 END IF;

EXCEPTION
 WHEN Form_Trigger_Failure THEN
 IF :System.Cursor_Item <> startitm THEN
 Go_Item(startitm);
 END IF;
 RAISE;

END Clear_All_Master_Details;

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TASK
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select t.task_seq,t.task_name from sr_task_codes t
where t.stamp_action <> 'D'
order by 1 desc

RecordGroup.Name: RG_STEP_NUM
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select DISTINCT r.step_num 
from RM_PROCESSES r 
where r.task_seq=:QUERY.TASK_CODE
and r.stamp_action <> 'D'
order by r.step_num

RecordGroup.Name: RG_TEMPLATE
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select * from (
select template_seq, template_desc, r.first_name||' '||r.family_name username,'יתרות' template_type, f.stamp_user
 from rm_templates f, rm_users r
 where f.stamp_action <> 'D'
 and template_desc not like '~temp_%'
 and template_desc is not null
 and r.user_name(+) = f.stamp_user
union all
select template_NUM, template_desc, r.first_name||' '||r.family_name username,'אכיפה' template_type,f.stamp_user
 from fr_template_search f, rm_users r
 where f.stamp_action <> 'D'
 and template_desc not like '~temp_%'
 and template_desc is not null
 and r.user_name(+) = f.stamp_user)
 order by 1 desc

RecordGroup.Name: JOB_STATUS_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery: select value_code, value_name from rm_decode_values where decode_code = 100

RecordGroup.Name: PROCESS_USER_RG
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select t.user_name,t.first_name||' '||t.family_name family_name from rm_users t
order by 2

RecordGroup.Name: R_ALL_STEP_NUM
RecordGroup.RecordGroupQuery:
select DISTINCT t.step_num 
from RM_PROCESSES t
where t.stamp_action <> 'D'
ORDER BY t.step_num

Trigger.Name: WHEN-WINDOW-DEACTIVATED
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF NOT ID_NULL(FIND_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER')) THEN
 DELETE_TIMER('REFRESH_TIMER');
 :QUERY.REFRESH_TIME := null;
 END IF;

Trigger.Name: ON-CLEAR-DETAILS
Trigger.TriggerText:
--
-- Begin default relation program section
--
BEGIN
 Clear_All_Master_Details;
END;
--
-- End default relation program section
--
